xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides the functions defined by the JSONiq specification, chapter 8 (Function Library). JSONiq extends the XQuery specification to also deal with JSON data natively.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Ghislain Fourny

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function dynamically builds an object, like the {||} syntax, except that it does not throw an error upon pair collision. Instead, it accumulates them into an array, if more than one.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $items A sequence of items, the objects of which are going to be accumulated into a single object.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:accumulate
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:accumulate($items as item()*) as object()

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns all arrays contained at any depth within a sequence of items.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The descendant arrays of the input sequence.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-arrays
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:descendant-arrays($items as item()*) as array()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The descendant arrays of the item

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-arrays-priv
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function libjn:descendant-arrays-priv($i as item()) as array()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns all objects contained at any depth within a sequence of items.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The descendant objects of the input sequence.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-objects
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:descendant-objects($items as item()*) as object()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The descendant objects of the item

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-objects-priv
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function libjn:descendant-objects-priv($i as item()) as object()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns all pairs contained at any depth within an sequence of items.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: All direct and indirect descendant pairs.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-pairs
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:descendant-pairs($items as item()*) as object()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The descendant pairs of the item

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:descendant-pairs-priv
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:descendant-pairs-priv($i as item()) as object()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns the intersection of the objects contained in the given sequence of items, aggregating values corresponding to the same key into an array.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The insersection of the objects contained in $items.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:intersect
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:intersect($items as item()*) as object()

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This functions returns all values of all objects contained in a sequence of items.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The values inside the objects of the sequence.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: libjn:values
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function libjn:values($items as item()*) as item()*
